name: How We Spoke Before
description:
How We Spoke Before by Kendra Parrish and Matthew Matheson

Explore a beautiful island with an ugly past to decipher a dead language.

Content Note: 'How We Spoke Before' is a celebration of language revitalization. It is a hopeful and bright game but does touch on the colonialist policies and racist attitudes that contribute to language loss and cultural genocide. Guard your mental health and engage with this game only when you feel emotionally prepared to do so. 

Controls: WASD to walk, E when prompted to interact, N to toggle notebook, Esc to access volume controls or quit the game.
